Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CLIPrinter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CLIPrinter
public class CLIPrinter extends Object
This class provides static methods for writing formatted text

    • displaySceneTitle

      public static void displaySceneTitle(String title, org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi.Color color)
      Prints the scene title with formatting. The title can be at most 50 chars long.
      Parameters:
      title - title to print

    • displayError

      Prints an error message with formatting.
      Parameters:
      msg - error message

      Parameters:
      description - the description
      commands - the available commands

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      This method clears the screen and repositions the cursor.

    • displayLoadingMessage

      public static boolean displayLoadingMessage(String msg, AtomicBoolean isLoading, AtomicBoolean isConnected, AtomicReference<String> error)
      This method is called while waiting for a server event. It shows a loading message until the given condition becomes false or the client loses connection. Can print an error message if given an AtomicReference of a String that is checked after waiting.
      Parameters:
      msg - message of loading animation
      isLoading - an AtomicBoolean that, upon becoming false, stops the loading animation
      isConnected - an AtomicBoolean that is true if the client is connected to the server
      error - an error message that can occurr if the request was invalid, set it to null to ignore
      Returns:
      true if successfully waited for the server (even if an error message arrived), false if connection was lost

    • printLobbies

      public static void printLobbies(List<LobbyInfo> lobbies, UserInfo userInfo)
      Prints available lobbies. If a UserInfo is given, the player will be highlighted.
      Parameters:
      lobbies - the list of lobbies to print
      userInfo - the UserInfo of the player to highlight

    • printAnsiGrid

      public static void printAnsiGrid(org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi[][] grid)
      Method that, given a grid of Ansi sequences, prints it.
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid of Ansi sequences

    • printPlayerElements

      public static void printPlayerElements(Map<Elements,Integer> elements)
      Prints the given player elements.
      Parameters:
      elements - the player elements as a map from an Element to an Integer
